title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
Description: If the key is blank, externalized text can't be displayed in the chart.
OB:
In the properties file, even though the key is left blank, it still contains a valid value.

Observed Behavior: The externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: Expected Behavior: When the key is blank, the externalized text should still be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Attempt to add a blank key.
